channel.title: I need help running a 317 Client on Windows 7! (I'll ++Rep!)
channel.description:
I downloaded this source to create a server: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,433417.msg3182266.html
But i tried the thread: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,425280.0.html
And the program is gone, please help me fix this probelm! I wanna play on my new server!
PLease help me!

item.title: I need help running a 317 Client on Windows 7! (I'll ++Rep!)
item.dc:creator: @Your_Master Your Master
item.description:
@Your_Master wrote:

In your run.bat in your client right click it and press edit. Delete everything inside it and replace it with this:

@echo off "c:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java" -javaw -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar GUI exit This might help you.

Read full topic
item.source: I need help running a 317 Client on Windows 7! (I'll ++Rep!)
